lyrics:
I don’t know if it’s right, but I got a feeling
And I want to believe this is magical
Is this what it’s like? ‘Cause I’m starting to feel it
And I want to believe it’s incredible
If you only knew all the things I could tell you
We could be dancing with stars in the night
It’s so magical – so magical
So beautiful – so beautiful
It’s a miracle
It’s a miracle, I can see it now
All the things I see – I think I see them too
All for you and me – just like a dream come true
It’s so beautiful – no one will ever know
It’s a miracle
Now you know that I’m right, and you got that feeling
I told you before that is magical – yes it’s magical
Now you know what it’s like, and you’re starting to feel it
But you just can’t deny it’s incredible
If I only knew all the things you could tell you
We could be dancing with stars in the night
It’s a miracle
It’s a miracle, I can see it now
All the things I see – I think I see them too
All for you and me – just like a dream come true
It’s so beautiful – no one will ever know
It’s a miracle
It’s a miracle
It’s a miracle, I can see it now
All the things I see – I think I see them too
All for you and me – oh, it’s like a dream come true
It’s so beautiful – no one will ever know
It’s a miracle
